column4: guys i installed skype yesterday and learnt the sound is not being recorded.then i installed qarecord and satrted working fine.i was able to make voice chat.today there was an update from skype when i installed that was i got the message that it was broken.i installed it through terminal and when i cheked sound system was off again.i remoced skype and qarecord and reinstalled.still my sound is not being recorded.can i get my system
to an older date as we do it on windows pls?
did you use the latest Skype ? or the older one, where the audio was actually working ?
possibly giving software version would help alot
